name: Classic Turkey Club
description: Sliced turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

name: Veggie Delight
description: Fresh seasonal vegetables with an avocado spread on multigrain bread.

name: Ham & Cheese Special
description: Premium ham with melted cheese and a mustard sauce on a baguette.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

name: Beef Burger Deluxe
description: A juicy beef patty with cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a brioche bun.

name: Mediterranean Falafel
description: Crispy falafel balls with hummus, tabbouleh, and tahini sauce in pita bread.

name: Grilled Cheese Supreme
description: Melted cheddar and mozzarella between buttery grilled sourdough bread.

name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: Fresh tuna, spicy mayo, and cucumber wrapped in seasoned sushi rice and seaweed.

name: Signature Tomato Soup
description: A warm, hearty tomato soup made from locally sourced tomatoes.

name: Garlic Bread Supreme
description: Oven-baked garlic bread with a crispy crust and soft interior, a classic favorite.

name: House Salad
description: Fresh garden salad with mixed greens and a choice of dressings.
